info.title: NuGaSa
info.author: nIxx
info.details:
NuGasa 0.1 (Nu Gamecube Saver)
============================
NuGaSa is a tool to backup your GC Save Files on Front SD 
or restore your or downloaded GC Save Files from Front SD.

USAGE
======
* Press 1 to backup a savegame 
* Press 2 to restore a savegame 
* Press Home Button to exit 
                              
The savegame backups will be stored in /GCSAVES
to restore or write an new savegame on the MC put the savegame into /GCSAVES
